TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper extends System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase

summary.span: 封裝 HTTP 內建物件，可讓伺服器收集已發出目前要求之瀏覽器功能的資訊。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables the server to gather information about the capabilities of the browser that has made the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並可做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別並公開型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外部的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
